name: STONE
description: A hungover koala detective, STONE wakes to find his chookie Alex has been kidnapped.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit (requires 64 bit OS) Processor: Dual Core Processor, 2.5 GHz or higher Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compatible video card Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
